title: Can't create item sets 7.11
body:
Can't create or duplicate item sets on the new launcher on 7.11
the create and duplicate buttons are both grayed out,
but i still have my old sets from old launcher.

replies.body: Ahhhh I think I know what's wrong here. I can't see your entire list, but I'm going to assume that you already have 20 sets created. At the moment it looks like 20 is the hard cap on how many custom sets you can have.
Yes i have 21 item sets that explains it.

That's some stupid crap. I can't believe we waited around for a patch so they could add the Item Sets back and then they cut the number down. I would rather I move Item Sets back onto the client computer side instead of the server side. 20 sets to cover ARAM, Ascension!

I'd rather just have the info stored on my computer and make as many as i want.

Will they ever change the amount of item sets avialable ? I used to have about 45 and I used them all :/ I heard riot was going to change the limit but idk I hope so. {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
